experience.title: Product
experience.description: Expertise in: Product 0-1, Roadmapping, Growth, scoping, budgeting, design thinking, dev sprint planning, & leading agile teams using Kanban and Scrum Methodologies Quoality• eDotCo: [Product Lead] scoping, design, development and delivery of a telecomm energy billing ERP for 24,000 sites, 1500 users, across Bangladesh and Malaysia • Yosaney.ai: [Product Manager] Led development for an AI platform that generates smart financial advices from SBI, HSBC, HDFC, ICICI and Citibank banking documentation for various MNCs and HNIs • TheHosteller(thehosteller.com):[Product Owner] design and development of end-to-end IT infrastructure including  website, admin panel, marketing and PMS(EZEE) integration, optimising sales and  operation channels increasing sales by 40%• Flybig:[Product Manager] scoped, designed  and led development for the customer facing website and enterprise operations platform for an Indian Airlines. Integrations with third party PMS system APIs such as Paxlinks, Gupshup, and a robust system design on AWS.

Integrations with third party PMS system APIs such as Paxlinks, Gupshup, and a robust system design on AWS.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: 10x exit, Organised a Food Donation Drive for 75,000+ covid refugees over 45 daysBased on a strong technological setting, this Cloud kitchen in Manipal was started as to fit into the huge gap in the town's food industry. As identified by a couple of students and Alumni, BX seemed to hit just the right notes with its audience in a terribly short period of time.

experience.title: Head Of Business Development
experience.description: Overlooking the Business Development department of the single largest media body in this side of the country, proved to be an extremely fruitful part of my journey. Apart from running the show in a largely student-based community, it gave me a stage to deploy projects that had long been on my mind. Being the mind behind Noir Select, a Customer Loyalty Program working around a Eight-Figure Saving for the city served as an excellent proof of concept, of having a sound sense of business, along with reading the pulse of a market.

experience.title: Internship Trainee
experience.description: An apprentice under the project manager for L&T's Northen Railway Revamp undertaking served as an insight at the daily workings at the construction site of a railway bridge, apart from the tracks laid down. The technical knowledge I gained during my time working proves to be priceless in more than one aspect of my journey.
